medium: Cotton, metallic threads, sequins; resist dyed (bandani)
title: Veil
description: gauzy, tie-dyed fabric; red borders with birds, figures on horseback, trees and flowers in multicolored circles; central pink rectangle with one large red medallion and four small medallions; gold metallic and purple trim
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
